messages.subject: RE: [samuraihistory] Hellow!
messages.msgSnippet: I am found of George Sansom s History of Japan which is in three volumes.  This covers what I think you are looking for, which appears to be a general
messages.messageBody:
I am found of George Sansom's "History of Japan" which is in three volumes. This covers what I think you are looking for, which appears to be a general history of Japan.

"Kee D. Curlee" <threekeys@...> wrote: Hello, Irish Kee here, I'm from Montana. I would like to know if there is
any books on Samurai that I can buy. What I had In mind was, A book of
Dynasties and the people that worked for them. Who ruled what eras and so
forth... I don't quite know how to ask this question. I want history and
the people in the era of a certain Shogun...

-----Original Message-----
From: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com]On Behalf Of saikyoumusasi
Sent: Tuesday, February 28, 2006 6:04 AM
To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [samuraihistory] Hellow!


I am a Japanese high school student.

In fact, I cannot speak English.
Therefore I use a translation tool.


I was surprised at there being so a lot
the person who examined it about a Japanese samurai.


If there is some question, I answer it as much as possible.

messages.subject: RE: [samuraihistory] Hellow!
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, Irish Kee here, I m from Montana.  I would like to know if there is any books on Samurai that I can buy. What I had In mind was, A book of Dynasties and
messages.messageBody:
Hello, Irish Kee here, I'm from Montana. I would like to know if there is
any books on Samurai that I can buy. What I had In mind was, A book of
Dynasties and the people that worked for them. Who ruled what eras and so
forth... I don't quite know how to ask this question. I want history and
the people in the era of a certain Shogun...

-----Original Message-----
From: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com]On Behalf Of saikyoumusasi
Sent: Tuesday, February 28, 2006 6:04 AM
To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [samuraihistory] Hellow!


I am a Japanese high school student.

In fact, I cannot speak English.
Therefore I use a translation tool.


I was surprised at there being so a lot
the person who examined it about a Japanese samurai.


If there is some question, I answer it as much as possible.
